```{r echo=FALSE, include=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# libraries and data
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

webdata <- read_excel("C:/Users/lydba/OneDrive - The Ohio State University/Apples/USDA and ODA Project Apples 2023/applewebsitedata.xlsx") %>%
  rename("Peel Toughness" = Peeltoughness,
         Sweetness = Sweet,
         Sourness = Sour)

webdata_long <- webdata %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = Red:Bitter, 
               names_to = "Trait",
               values_to = "Value")
```

![](img/3-79-crop.png)

```{r echo=FALSE}
# trait figure
webdata_long %>%
  filter(Trait == "Sweetness" | Trait == "Sourness" | Trait == "Crispness" | Trait == "Juiciness", PublicPrivate == "public") %>%
  filter(AppleName == "3-79") %>%
  group_by(AppleName) %>%
  group_split() %>%
  purrr::map(function(apple_data) {
    apple_name <- unique(apple_data$PresentationName)
    ggplot(apple_data, aes(x = Value, y = Trait, fill = Trait)) +
      geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
      scale_x_continuous(limits = c(0, 10), breaks = c(0, 5, 10)) +
      theme_classic(base_size = 30) +
      theme(legend.position = "none") +
      theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust=0.5)) +
      labs(x = "Rating",
           y = "") +
      scale_fill_viridis_d()})
```
